text: garaz sulemaan ko jo banavaana manzoor hota ye jinnaat unake lie banaate the (jaise) masjiden, mahal, qile aur (pharishte ambiya kee) tasveeren aur hauzon ke baraabar pyaale aur (ek jagah) gadee huee (badee badee) degen (ki ek hazaar aadamee ka khaana pak sake) ai daood kee aulaad shukr karate raho aur mere bandon mein se shukr karane vaale (bande) thode se hain
